name: hpaterson-teacmcityagents
author: helen paterson abcam plc
description:
This module installs a teamcity agent on windows by copying the zip file installer contents to the local directory.

Addtionally:

- installs java for the TC agent
- powershell script for creating a windows service
-  places the buildagent.properties config file with the TC server parameters.

See the readme.md for more details

puppet 3.4.2+ agent required
